channel.title: Server help plz
channel.description: this is so strange cause i can log on my server with:stickscape.no-ip.info but when other ppl try to log in it doesnt work.... im NOT advertising my server....

item.title: Server help plz
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

i finally found my admin functions i went into user and put in a new rule for port 43594 TCP and then clicked add. THen i went into network functions got into exceptions and added 43594 TCP[br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2007, 08:17:12 PM[/size][hr]i mean it works on all my other comps its wierd it just doesnt work on someone outside my house… :o [br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2007, 08:18:39 PM[/size][hr]i mean i just dont understand this

item.title: Server help plz
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

opening the port in your firewall ison the create a server tut…
Open Network & Internet Connections. Right click on the connection you’re using to connect to the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”.
Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field.
At the Port number fill in 43594.
And make sure the TCP box has been checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help plz
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if u port fowarded on all modems and routers doesn’t matter how much you got if one of them stops the connection they all stop… software gotta be portfowarded too like firewalls etc… not only hardware.

item.title: Server help plz
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

Thats because you didn’t portfoward. If your running the DUC and your not portforwarded theres nothing that it needs to connect to, thats why it worked.
